resources.string: In order to display the current time as a notification, this app needs your permission for that. Please click on \"OK\" to grant it.
Is seems you permanently declined location permission. You can go to the app settings to grant it.
In order to track your location, this app needs your permission for that. Please click on \"OK\" to grant it.
Is seems you permanently declined notification permission. You can go to the app settings to grant it.
Do you want to resume or finish the run?
"You reach %1d kilometers. The run will be continue, until you press stop button."
